item.title: 购物车
item.description: 购物车 购物车列表 get: cart/index // 返回值 { "errno": 0, "errmsg": "", "data": { "cartList": [ { "id": 29, "user_id": 32, "goods_id": 1181004, "goods_sn": "1018002", "goods_name": "多功能午睡枕", "product_id": 282, "price": 127, "number": 1, "specifications": [ "标准" ], "checked": 1, "pic_url": "http://localhost:8080/wx/storage/fetch/eg8mq8jw4flwaifcpubu.jpg", "add_time": "2018-10-10 17:23:53", "deleted": 0, "version": 0, "goods_specifition_name_value": "标准" } ], "cartTotal": { "goodsCount": 1, "goodsAmount": 127, "checkedGoodsCount": 1, "checkedGoodsAmount": 127 }, "policyInfo": [ "满90免邮费" ] } } 添加商品到购物车 如果购物车里面已经存在此商品，需要 +1 操作
